title: Powerextra 8.0 Inches Tablet Monitor Sunshade Hood for DJI Mavic pro, Spark, Phantom 2/3 and Phantom 4/4 Pro Transmitters, Fit for iPad mini 4/3/2, Samsung Galaxy 8.0 Tab S2/3, Nexus Tab 7/8
feature: NOTE: Can't fit for NVIDIA SHIELD K1. Perfectly fit for ipad mini 4/3/2, Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8.0" SM-T715C, T710, T713, T719C, Tab 4 7.0" T270, Google Nexus Tab 7 (7.0") /Tab 8 (8.0") and other brand Smart Tablet with a size smaller than 8.0", but can't fit tablet length more than 8.0 inch.

Suitable Quadcopter: DJI Mavic Pro, Phantom 2, 3 Advanced, Professional, 4K, Inspire 1 and Phantom 4, 4 Pro drones. Not fit for Phantom 3 standard drone. ( Only sunshade hood, not including Phantom drones remote controller)

Quick release, foldable and lightweight sunshade hood, convenient for storage, black lining protects your eyes from light reflection. Before installing, you'd better remove the external protective case of your tablet.
Quality Material: Made of premium soft synthetic leather, the monitor sunshade hood is highly durable and comfortable.
48 pcs anti-skid built-in fix type suckers enable cellphone to be easily installed and removed, and protect your smart tablet from dropped.
description: specializes in digital camera batteries, flight batteries, power tool batteries and photographic accessories on Amazon. Monitor sunshade hood (size): Length 23.0cm Width 14.0cm Height 18.0cmMaterial: PC Leather Color: White & Black These monitor sunshade hood are widely compatible with Phantom 3 professional, advanced, 4K, Inspire1/2 and 4/4 Pro remote controller Suitable for Tablet: ipad mini 4/3/2 Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 8.0" SM-T715C, T710, T713, T719CSamsung Galaxy Tab 4 7.0" T270 Google Nexus Tab 7 (7.0"), Tab 8 (8.0") Other brand Smart Tablet with a size smaller than 8.0" Made of highly durable PC Leather, the sunshade hood has great durability and skid resitance. It’s well manufactured and designed to be lightweight, stable, comfortable in use. The foldable and lightweight sunshade hood is very easy to use and convenient to store 1 x Remote Controller Monitor Hood
